original_text: The other Israelite people, priests and Levites lived in the other towns of Judah. They lived in the homes that belonged to their families. The other Israelite people, priests and Levites lived in the other towns of Judah. They lived in the homes that belonged to their families.
korean_text: 그 나머지 이스라엘 백성과 제사장과 레위 사람은 유다 모든 성읍에 흩어져 각각 자기 기업에 살았고

sentences.original_text: The other Israelite people, priests and Levites
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 이스라엘 백성들, 제사장들과 레위 사람들은

sentences.original_text: lived in the other towns of Judah.
